simpdf.cl_utils (module) ∞

CL tool for simpdf

Author:David Young
Date Created:September 28, 2015
Usage:

simpdf url <urlToParse> <destinationFolder> [-s <pathToSettingsFile>]

-h, --help show this help message
-v, --version show version
-s, --settings the settings file

urlToParse the url of the article to parse and convert to PDF destinationFolder the folder to add the parsed PDF to

simpdf.cl_utils.main(arguments=None)[source] ∞

The main function used when ``cl_utils.py`` is run as a single script from the cl, or when installed as a cl command
